title: Language Learning Effectiveness Enhancement Program Through Classroom Space Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational language teaching methodologies and elementary education environments
context.additional_context: Language education specialization course for office workers (administrative/managerial). Environment allowing personalized smart device usage. Measures practical application competencies through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Teachers can categorize the physical arrangement of classroom space into three or more types based on learner interaction patterns and reconfigure it according to situational needs.
Learners can analyze the teacherâ€™s movement patterns and interpret educational intentions (e.g., individual instruction vs. group discussion facilitation) with over 80% accuracy.

By measuring and comparing case studies of team-based classroom space reorganization using spatial metrics (e.g., teacher-student contact frequency, spatial dispersion index), an optimal learning environment can be designed.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
